tool_description: humm is a ready-made, open, and fully catalogued “white label” index of online music, offered to developers through our ground-breaking API. humm enables developers to create their own innovative — and 100% legal — music solutions, and businesses to build music into their services. In a word, we aim to be the Android of Music Services.
name: humm
title: humm

api_list.name: Popular Artists
api_list.description: Get a list of artists popular on Humm; returns a list of artist objects

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of returned results (20 by default)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset results by said number (0 by default)

api_list.name: Search Artists
api_list.description: Search for an artist; returns a list of artist objects

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of returned results (20 by default)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset results by said number (0 by default)

api_list.name: Recent Artists
api_list.description: Get a list of artists recently added on Humm; returns a list of artist objects

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset results by said number (0 by default)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of returned results (20 by default)

api_list.name: Featured Artists
api_list.description: Get a list of artists featured by Humm; returns a list of artist objects

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset results by said number (0 by default)

optional_parameters.name: genre
optional_parameters.description: Filter results by genre

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of returned results (20 by default)

api_list.name: Artist: Top Songs
api_list.description: Get a list of an artist's top songs; returns a list of song objects for a given artist id

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of returned results (20 by default)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset results by said number (0 by default)

optional_parameters.name: songtype
optional_parameters.description: Filter by type of song: track (default), cover, video.

api_list.name: Artist: Playlists / Albums
api_list.description: Get playlists / albums associated with an artist; returns a list of playlist / album objects for a given id

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of returned results (20 by default)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset results by said number (0 by default)

api_list.name: Artist: Details
api_list.description: Get an artist; returns artist object for a given id

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset results by said number (0 by default)

api_list.name: User: Details
api_list.description: Get a user; returns a user object for a given id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://humm-api.p.rapidapi.com/users/5649c572ae8c502824a46a99"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "humm-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://humm-api.p.rapidapi.com/users/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "humm-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Song: Appears In
api_list.description: Get a list of playlists a song appears in; returns a list of playlist objects for a given id

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Unique identifier of song (ex. Song 2 by Blur)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of returned results (20 by default)

api_list.name: Discover Playlists / Albums
api_list.description: Get a list of recommended playlists / albums; returns a list of playlist / album objects

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of returned results (20 by default)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset results by said number (0 by default)

api_list.name: Popular Playlists
api_list.description: Get a list of playlists popular on Humm; returns a list of playlist objects (for an optional selection or user id)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of returned results (20 by default)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset results by said number (0 by default)

optional_parameters.name: selection
optional_parameters.description: Filter by "featured" (popular featured playlists), "own" (popular playlists for given user), "following" (popular playlists within given user subscriptions)

optional_parameters.name: uid
optional_parameters.description: Unique identifier of user

api_list.name: Search Playlists / Albums
api_list.description: Search Playlists / Albums; returns a list of playlist / album objects

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of returned results (20 by default)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset results by said number (0 by default)

optional_parameters.name: album
optional_parameters.description: Search an album (true) or a playlist (false; default)

api_list.description: Get a list of playlists featured by Humm; returns a list of playlist objects

api_list.name: Radio
api_list.description: Get a list of songs for a radio; returns a list of song objects (*Must pass in one optional parameter e.g. 'rock')

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of returned results (20 by default)

optional_parameters.name: genres
optional_parameters.description: String or list of strings

optional_parameters.name: moods
optional_parameters.description: String or list of strings

optional_parameters.name: own
optional_parameters.description: Current user's radio (false by default)

optional_parameters.name: discovery
optional_parameters.description: Current user's discovery radio (false by default)
